ValidationRule.description: before selecting Stage to Approved for a Treatment Assistance Application, need to Select Financial Assistance Needs on Application.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Application_Status__c , "Approved"), RecordType.DeveloperName = "Treatment_Assistance_Program", ( ISPICKVAL(Financial_Assistance_Needs__c , "") ), !$Setup.Bypass__c.Validation__c, LOWER($Setup.Bypass__c.SObject__c) <> "all", LOWER($Setup.Bypass__c.SObject__c) <> "application__c" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please Select "Financial Assistance Need" to Approve this Application
